org.flexiblepower.ral.values

Class Commodity<BQ extends javax.measure.quantity.Quantity,FQ extends javax.measure.quantity.Quantity>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.flexiblepower.ral.values.Commodity<BQ,FQ>
  • Type Parameters:
    BQ - Quantity of the Billable Unit
    FQ - Quantity of the Flow Unit
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Commodity.Electricity, Commodity.Gas, Commodity.Heat

    public abstract class Commodity<BQ extends javax.measure.quantity.Quantity,FQ extends javax.measure.quantity.Quantity>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This abstract class contains information about the units that are used for a particular commodity. There are currently implementations for the commodities ELECTRICITY and GAS.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • getBillableUnit

        public javax.measure.unit.Unit<BQ> getBillableUnit()
        Returns:
        The unit that is used for billing purposes. E.g. for electricity this is kWh, for gas m^3 is used. There will be helper methods to transform the flowUnit into billableUnit (see amount(Measurable, Measurable) and average(Measurable, Measurable)).

      • getFlowUnit

        public javax.measure.unit.Unit<FQ> getFlowUnit()
        Returns:
        The unit that indicates the rate at which a commodity is being consumed or produced. E.g. for electricity this would be power expressed in the watt unit (W), for gas m^3/s is used.

      • average

        public abstract javax.measure.Measurable<FQ> average(javax.measure.Measurable<BQ> amount,
                                   javax.measure.Measurable<javax.measure.quantity.Duration> duration)
        Parameters:
        amount - The billable amount of this commodity
        duration - The duration over which the amount has been measured
        Returns:
        The flow amount that represents the average flow, using the total amount sent over the given duration.

      • amount

        public abstract javax.measure.Measurable<BQ> amount(javax.measure.Measurable<FQ> average,
                                  javax.measure.Measurable<javax.measure.quantity.Duration> duration)
        Parameters:
        average - The average flow amount of this commodity
        duration - The duration over which the flow has been measured
        Returns:
        The billable amount that represents the total amount that has been measured

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
